ai-patthana7.8:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana7.8:1.1_0: because of not seeing the teaching you should give up. ...”
ai-patthana7.8:1.1_2: You shouldn’t give up relying on not wanting to develop the teaching.
ai-patthana7.8:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
